comments.author: wwzsocki
comments.body: How to participate?1. download desktop version of Utopia client: https://u.is/en/download.html2. to apply share here your Utopia Public Key or uNS Name and BTC wallet address 3. I will send DM to provided Public Key using Utopia uMessenger or uMail to verify/confirm every participant,4. reply in Utopia (uMessenger or uMail) and get 8CRP (5$) To check Utopia poker client5. play few hands, come back and write review (100 words minimum) about Utopia poker client, let's discuss the pros and cons,6. after review I will send reward in BTC (10$)PSMobile version doesn't support poker yetmy Utopia Public Key: 8AA5420496ACD8021D9C018693777C70F06FC27C6C3C2592BA1075024E3AC23Dmy uNS - emoneyabc

comments.author: MArsland
comments.body: After trying a few rounds by inviting members in the utopia group, it's strange that the person I play with every time I play immediately leaves and then enters again. Still don't understand the rules for sure but to be honest, I enjoyed the game. There is a time lag for each player but 59s/1min seems too long because I want a fast game. Then an error occurred which made me uncomfortable playing, It seems that the network must be stable for both me and my opponent so that the game can run well. with cards Queen, Queen, Five, Five, and Ace cards are good enough to start winning. From the start of the game to the end, I never lost.even with minimal initial capital, history:Code:Dealer: Hand: #213530328760235989: naira wins pot (0.002)Dealer: Hand: #214554805283672265: naira wins pot (0.00392)Dealer: Hand: #215425290459213962: naira wins pot (0.0196)Dealer: Hand: #216412670818026006: naira wins pot (0.4165392) with cards Queen, Queen, Nine, Nine, KingDealer: Hand: #217668814876110867: naira wins pot (0.14896) with cards King, King, Two, Two, AceDealer: Hand: #219309764615048558: naira wins pot (0.21364) with cards Queen, Queen, Five, Five, AceBecause I was addicted to going back to the table against other skilled users, I lost badly in the end with all in. comments.author: entebah
comments.body: yesterday after i got my CRP i immediatly create a poker room and the room is very easy to create but i believe it will be good if we can know how many people online that open the poker client on Utopia ecosystem, because if we know maybe the player will not wait too long for other players to join. btw i got the same error with naira which is cant do turn wrong sequence number and i forgot to screenshot that error. I just wondering why i got that error because i believe i got that error on the first hand at that time. Quote from: naira on September 08, 2023, 03:09:54 PMmaybe adding an option that the players can choose which seat they want because at the moment you can't choose which seat you want.
